titleStmt.title: Maran-atha: = the second advent, or, Christ's coming to judgment. A sermon / preached before the honorable judges of assize, at Warwick: July 25. 1651. By William Durham, B.D. late preacher at the Rolls, now pastor of the church at Tredington in Worcester shire.
titleStmt.author: Durham, William, 1611-1684.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Maxey, for M.M. G. Bedell, and T. Collins: and are to be sold at their shop, at the Middle Temple gate, Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: their shop, at the Middle Temple gate
